summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Westlake Avenue North, from Denny Way to Roy Street; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7268, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
